title: 12 perch nice square land for sale in Boralesgamuwa
details:
Dear Sir / Madam,

12 perch land located in Boralesgamuwa.

Square land with 20 feet road access.

highly residential area. 300 meters to 120 bus route and 500 meters to boralesgamuwa town.

Price. 1.3 million perch. Negotiate

Please call for more details.

Regards
Dilan
